description: half length portrait of Jean Baptiste Tavernier in an oval frame on a pedestal with scroll supports at sides; subject facing right looking out at viewer; subtle pattern in caot with lace at neck; inscription around frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate in black: [JEAN BAPTISTE TAVERNIER ESCRVIER BARON D\'AVBONNE, AGE DE LXXIV ANS. 1679/ (left side of pedestal)Joan Hainzelman/ ad viuum del et sculp./ cum priuil Regis 1679/ (right side of pedestal) A Paris chez ted. Bain/ sur le petit pont a/ Lercharpe blanche/ (9 lines in French) De Paris a Dely ...rare qui lui  43/ and coat of arms in center of pedestal]
title: Portrait of Jean Baptiste Tavernier
